description.narrative: Under this project, Camfed is working in partnership with Pearson to transform educational opportunities for girls in Zimbabwe and Tanzania. 60,000 girls who have either dropped out of school or are at high risk of doing so will receive direct support to complete secondary education (40,000 in Zimbabwe, 20,000 in Tanzania). An additional 400,000 girls and boys in 970 rural secondary schools in 24 districts in Zimbabwe and 10 districts in Tanzania will benefit from actions to improve their learning and push up their results. CAMA, Camfed’s peer supported network of young women school-leavers will play a key role in delivery of this project as they roll out an innovative Learner Guide model.;
